text: Divit (age 22). Goal: Reach 20% REM sleep and maintain deep sleep >2h. Chronotype: Night Owl. Sleep schedule: 12:00 AM to 7:30 AM. Tried meditation (effective), avoided caffeine after 6 PM. Trackers: Oura Ring + Apple Watch. Lives in Chembur, Mumbai. Stress level: Moderate due to college workload.
